turns.answer:
I am not. I am a human being.

I am the living, breathing, unruly, human body, in which all the things I think and feel are living things.

I am an innocent, living human being
turns.label: truth

turns.answer:
I am going to lie in bed and then walk off.


Question: How many times did you go to your hotel room last night?

Answer: There was only one time. I walked in. I don't remember going
